input_email_body:
Subject: Serious Incident: Unauthorized Access to Medical Data

An incident involving unauthorized access to medical data has occurred within the hospital system You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. This might have arisen due to a compromise of network security protocols. We have initiated the process of updating security settings and running diagnostic scans on connected devices to contain the issue. My name is Carlos Mendoza.
